    • Method Detail

      • getFileExtension

        public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.nio.file.Path fpath)
        Returns the extension of the image file name, excluding the dot.

        If the file name does not contain an extension, an empty string is returned.

        Parameters:
        fpath - the file path
        Returns:
        the file extension, for example: "jpg" or "png" etc, or an empty string if none

        Parameters:

        fileTime - the file time to set

      • calculateShiftTiffHeader

        public static int calculateShiftTiffHeader(byte[] payload)
        Scans the specified byte payload to identify the starting index of the TIFF Magic Bytes (Byte Order Marks). *

        This method identifies both Little Endian ('II') or Big Endian ('MM') headers, validating against the TIFF version markers (0x2A for Standard TIFF or 0x2B for BigTIFF). This is essential for skipping container-specific preambles such as the JPEG 'Exif\0\0' signature or HEIF-specific metadata offsets.

        Parameters:
        payload - the raw byte array to be scanned
        Returns:
        the zero-based index of the first byte of the TIFF header, or -1 if no valid TIFF signature is detected
